contentList.content: Cursed and mutilated to grow larger than its skin can contain, this Redcap has lived in agony for decades. Its mind was stunted by pain, but its desire for freedom is as endless as its potential. The curse that binds the Redcap acts as an eternal font of blood, removing the creature's need for its crimson hat to survive. This was done purposefully, to prolong its tortured existence.

Despite no longer fitting in your original iron boots, your inability to remain hidden persists as if they never left your feet. You have <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISADVANTAGE">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Stealth checks
The very nature of a Redcap calls for blood to be spilled. You deal an additional 1d4 damage with melee weapon attacks.
Unleash a barrage of strikes upon your victim.
Dash across the landscape, leveling all in your path.
